reviewText: It's true the acting and casting was superb in this outstanding production.  This really does stick out as being an outstanding made for TV movie.  Few catch my attention these days like this one did.  The plot is about a psychologist radio talk show host who attracts the attention of the murderer of one of her callers she had given advice to. He forms a plot to get into her life to destroy her after believing she influenced his wife to try and break free causing her to get into fatal accident.  William Moses proves himself an impressive outstanding and seasoned actor. Keep your eyes on Moses, this guy is really convincingly psycho.  He's been around since the early 80's and has the evil lover revenge thing down to the tee.  As for Alexandra Paul the psychologist, she was just as good as all the other women in the case.  They were all excellent in this film. Excellent screenplay.
summary: One of the Best Made For TV Dramas I've Seen in a While
Title: A Lover's Revenge

reviewText: This was alright.  Nothing special, but worth watching if you like thrillers.  The plot wasen't too original, a type of revenage movie.  If you have nothing better to do then its alright seeing it.
Title: A Lover's Revenge

reviewText: great in everything love the time it got to me . dvd was in great shape . and cases was in great shape too thanks
Title: A Lover's Revenge

reviewText: Somewhat predictable and some bad acting by the husband (Rob).  Overall it was okay for a 'B' movie.Some of you may remember Alexandra Paul who played on Baywatch, now she did deliver...job well done.  Oh yeah, the 'lover' was a hottie also.Rent it, but don't spend alot to buy it.
Title: A Lover's Revenge

reviewText: A lovers revenge I like this movie William R. Moses does a fine acting part in this plus the other actors I like.
Title: A Lover's Revenge

reviewText: Radio psychologist Liz Manners(Alexandra Paul) has all the answers for women in band relationships. But after a certain caller follows her advice and ends up dead, the grieving husband is out for blood...and he knows just the frequency to follow.
Title: A Lover's Revenge
